duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and lead the design, pricing, and implementation of insurance products within the actuarial department.
Supervise a small team within actuarial modeling, risk management, valuation, or other actuarial department.
Provide reports and analyses on sales, persistency and mortality experience, reserve adequacy, risk management information, and actuarial aspects of product development.
Manage studies that underlie actuarial assumptions and provide assumptions and data to others.
Monitor and analyze developments in actuarial techniques, laws, regulations, and competitive developments in the marketplace.
Represent the company on industry and professional committees, with regulators, and possibly supervise a small team of employees.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Actuarial Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics or related field and 6 years of relevant experience. In lieu of Bachelor's, will accept Master's in a listed discipline and 4 years of relevant experience.

FSA or equivalent professional designation along with Bachelor's Degree and 6 years of relevant experience. In lieu of FSA will accept ASA or equivalent professional designation and 10 years of relevant experience.
